My dog is in perfect health. She is active. She has tons of energy. And her coat and teeth are radiant. People compliment her coat all the time. She is perfect. Orijen has changed her life. I will NEVER stop using this food!

When she was younger, I used the puppy version as well. She loves this stuff. Eats is quickly and always wants more. The only thing she likes more than Orijen is my grilled chicken breast!

Finally, if your dog has any issues with seizures, this is probably the best food on the market for your buddy. Do research on the web. And believe me -- you'll see the difference.

This is a healthy snack. If you can control yourself, just a few are satisfying. The lemon is
refreshing with just the right taste of sweetness. I keep them in stock.

Blah, no flavor. Tea made in India. What little flavor there is, is
fake. very artificial. Thinking about it? Buy a box of Twinings and
you will thank me later.

This is the only hot chocolate mix I will buy, but my local grocery stores rarely have it in stock.  It has a perfect degree of chocolatey-ness and is not too sweet. I haven't found any others that are even close.
Good and tasty. nothing fancy and probably not what someone with a refined tea-pallet likes but it's pretty good to me!

Even for "medium" sized chews, our 2 rat terriers (8 lbs and 13 lbs) breezed through these.  They hardly spent much time at all actually chewing them.  I ordered another bag, this time trying the large ones, to see if they last a little longer. I got them hoping it would help improve their breath a little bit. There may be a small improvement, but it hasn't been that long so I'm not sure if they're doing the trick or not. We'll see.

I will probably take this for the rest of my life.  My husband also takes it.  I also just purchased some for my sister in law for some problems she's having.  Believe the great reviews.  This stuff helps to relax your mind and body for a good night's sleep and it keeps your digestive tract regular.  If I miss a day or two, I can definitely tell the difference.

I heard about drinking sage tea on the Dr. Oz show. Though sage is most commonly used in cooking, sage tea has been shown to boost alertness and mood, while decreasing anxiety, I was told.

I find it very soothing. I was surprised that I actually like the taste. It's a woodsy taste just very appealing. It always makes me feel good afterward. The tea is caffeine free so I normally drink it in the afternoon or evening as I still need the caffeine coffee provides in the morning.

This is a great product and I will most likely order it again.

Not sure how many of you have this problem, but I was frequently constipated and struggled to find a healthy way to deal with it without laxatives. My brother mentioned that flaxseed worked for him.  Spectrum Essentials Organic Ground Flaxseed has a texture similar to corn meal. My brother adds it to his oatmeal for breakfast. I have heard others make oatmeal cookies with flaxseed added. I wanted to do something a little more hardcore that would take less time and effort, allowing me to be consistant. So after hearing that apple juice, or aloe vera juice also helps with constipation, I chose to simply add 2 tablespoons to 1/2 a glass of apple juice and I drink that grainy concoction first thing in the morning, and also when I get home after work. It took some getting use to, but now I am a pro and do it religiously. Taking it makes me more regular (most times now going once a day, sometimes I miss a day but in the past I could go a week before getting relief). Try a recipe that works in your diet and schedule, but just get it in daily for results.  You have to remember to drink 8 glasses of water per day. Side effects for me were all positive, I feel fuller and don't have food cravings, so I shed about 8 pounds naturally without changing anything else. I am 5'4" and before the flaxseed regimen I weighed 125-6 lbs, now I am down to 118 lbs. I never thought I could lose that annoying 5 pounds I had tried to lose for many years, and with flax seed it just happened and has not returned over a 6 month period and I have a 2-3 pound cushion. The product is great but the price varies. On Amazon I pay about $4 per bag, in the grocery stores I have seen it for $8.99 a bag. My brother buys 16 oz bags of Bob's Red Mill Whole Ground Flaxseed Meal at "Big Lots" for $2.50. So shop around. The product is a 5 star product, I give it 4 because of the price, I kicked myself when I found out my brotehr found a comparable product for $1.50 less than I could gt it for on Amazon. But I actually love it.....
only $13.29 a case on the petco site (Oct 20, 2011) - not worth the .70 cents a can they're charging here.

Cinnamon Oat Clusters:
This was yummy plain but fabulous with milk. I think I used almond milk. It is a bit on the sweet side, so I'd not want to eat it every day, but as a treat it's perfect and I enjoyed it very much. The abundance of large clusters make it easy to just eat it dry out of the bag, too.

Vanilla Blueberry Clusters:
This was less exciting to me, although still okay, and it was marginally less sweet than the cinnamon one. I guess it had more of a cardboard taste. I was expecting something more fruity and there are no dried blueberries at all, just some blueberry puree mixed in.
I ordered this for my son. He was thrilled. While I was glad he was happy, I felt stupid paying that amount to have cereal shipped. I will NOT do this again!!

I purchased these based on a recommendation from the Hungry Girl emails as a great low fat snack.  These are ok, but the flavor is definitely not what I was expecting, there is almost a burnt quality to the flavor.  Also, the serving size doesn't seem like that much since the cookies are very thin.  For similar nutritionals you can have about the same amount of Keebler Elfin Crackers, which are much more tasty and satisfying.  If you liked the McDonaldland Cookies as a kid, go for the Elfin Crackers, they are very similar in flavor.
Vegan snack.  Peanut butter inside a pretzel.  Great snack!  Not too salty.  Crunchy.  Glad I ordered this.

I am the unofficial M&M supplier in my office. I keep a bowl stocked for drive-by snackers. Over the years, Peanut M&Ms have proven to be the biggest draw of all. Other candy goes through a rotation but the Peanut M&Ms are a constant.

The holiday editions of M&Ms are the best of the best, since you know that when they appear on the shelves they will be fresh and crunchy. (The ordinary bags can sit in the store for months before they're purchased.) If you've ever sampled an aging M&M next to a fresh one, you will know what I mean.

So whenever a holiday version of M&Ms hits the market, I grab em up.

And of course this includes heading to the local stores on the day *after* the holiday in question, since there are immediate markdowns and you can stockpile for the weeks ahead.

Happy snacking!
My dogs love these treats.  Super cute design and nice small size.  They smell absolutely amazing.  It's hard to believe it is a dog treat.
My order was exactly as it should be, I got what I ordered in a short delivery time.

I ordered then read the reviews.  When I saw a review that said the actual quantity was 5 not 75, I called to confirm.  They said it is an error in the system, but if you go down to description, it says 5.....
I got these so I can always have some packets at work - I think I'm set for a while.  I didn't quite realize just how many of these there were... But, it's good and makes a nice quick snack at work!

First of all, let me be clear that I really like this product. It's yummy and the price is good. The reason for the one star rating is that I have been reordering it for quite a while. I reorder from my shopping list, so I don't read the description carefully, since I am just re-ordering exactly the same thing I've gotten before (or so I thought). This time, the bottles were half the size, but the price was the same. I looked at an old bottle (actually, can) and noted that it was 16.9 oz. This time, the three cans were each 8.5 oz! Now, the description clearly says 8.5 oz., so I can't complain about that, but it came off my shopping list, which always before sent me three 16.9 oz cans. So, bottom line is just be careful if you've ordered this in the past and be aware of what you are getting. It's still a good value (just not a killer deal, as it was before!)

We LOVE giving these as gifts at Christmas. We love smashing one at either Christmas or New Year's . It is a wonderful tradition and the peppermint is really good.

However, it took TOO long to ship and almost missed Christmas to give as gifts to friends and neighbors - the product I give a 5 - the shipper I give a 2.

These are essentially like regular, somewhat thin slices of a baguette or Italian loaf, which have been dried so they are lightly toasted and crispy. They are not as hard or thin as melba toast or bagel chips. They have more of a "honeycomb" crispiness than a "snappy" crispiness. The texture is really nice. Like any dried bread, you will probably get a few little crumbs and occasional breakage, but these generally handle very nicely and neatly. The flavor is of a fresh, neutral but not bland bread. These make a great base for all kinds of toppings and they work with dips too. I haven't had any problems with them turning soggy at all even with moist toppings. These would make great large croutons for quickly preparing something like a classic French onion soup gratin.

They come in a package which has two stacks of slices, each wrapped with corrugated paper to help protect them from breakage and keep them fresh. You get a nice amount per package.

While I personally haven't had a problem with breakage in this product, Amazon's deliveries are sometimes bizzarely packaged. Considering that these are a somewhat delicate item, you might not want to order these in combination with something like canned goods, just to be safe in the delivery packing.
Our 2 Cats enjoy breakfast with Newman's Own and somedays they seem to be smiling.  Definte good attitudes result and their fur keeps smooth.  No upset stomachs!
Kudos for being organic, containing einkorn flour and having a nice design however... the taste isn't great. The Einkorn Flour has a slightly strong wheat flavor which may require trained taste buds.

An excellent quality tea! I very much enjoyed sipping this brew and lounging in front of the TV. I am quite impressed and will likely buy more after I finish off what I have already bought. The quantity was excellent for the price and I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to try some Oolong tea. I will more than likely use this seller again.
Not bad coffee for the price but for less money you can get a good Sumatra from the same supplier.

Two years ago I developed a sudden break out of eczema on the back of one hand, something I had never experienced before. I tried every lotion I could get my hands on to help sooth it, to no avail, and I eventually ended up having to use a topical prescription steroid cream to get it to go away (not something I really was comfortable using). Then I found this product. It's fantastic, and has completely replaced the steroid cream, as well as my other regular body lotion. I use it twice a day, and it leaves my skin so soft and hydrated, it feels wonderful. Another reviewer commented on the strong scent, and while I am usually super sensitive to perfumes I find that this goes on a bit strong but quickly dissipates, leaving a soft and very pleasant scent. I love the body wash as well. Well worth the price listed here, although as someone else mentioned, it is cheaper at Walmart and you save yourself the shipping cost.

I originally found this product in a specialty shop in Monterey and am so glad to have found it here! Great fresh garlic flavor. I love it on steaks but the wife likes it on fish. Actually no fat but you'd never know it. Very versatile.

My dogs love these treats. They're easy to break up into smaller pieces for training treats. Dogs with allergies can usually enjoy these without consequences, as there is no wheat or other allergenic filler.

Amazon has by far the best price I've been able to find for these--especially if you are a Super Saver member.

these are the best animal crackers i've ever tasted! the chocolate simply adds to the deliciousness. they taste like mini-cookies. they are vegan and thus cruelty-free! organic and yummy. what more can be asked of an animal cracker!

The price was excellent & I heard many good things about the Kind bars... but the mango macadamia bar didn't taste all that great. I would be willing to try other flavors, but I would not buy this flavor again.

This product is fantastic. It truly is the prince of all spices. I've used it to zest up over 9000 recipes. I know what you're thinking, "what, 9000? THAT'S IMPOSSIBLE!" But it's really just that good. I highly recommend it.

I haven't tried the tea yet, but my friends have (which is why I bought it in the first place) and the way the teabag opens up into a flower is simply delightful!  When my gift set arrived, it was beautifully and well packaged.  The box is pretty, the teapot is petite, and the tea smells very nice.  I am looking forward to my next "tea party!"
I love the flavor of  slivers of chewy coconut, honey and almonds  it really does taste great to me.So far this is my favorite KIND

Usually a big fan of Bob's Red Mill products, this one does not blow my mind. The first few times I cooked it in the microwave, it exploded all over the place and left a sticky mess (Cooked it on high for 3 minutes as the instructions read). Covering it with a plate or foil does not help. I figured out that stirring after the 1st and 2nd minute prevents it from boiling over. You do have to let it sit for several minutes before it's cool enough to eat.

The texture of this cereal is very grainy, which can not be helped by adding more liquid. I add splenda and fat free yogurt to give it better taste and texture, sometimes I slice some banana into it before I cook it.

I prefer Bob's organic 6 grain and the 5 grain cereals over this.

Immedieatly after i bought this i opened and drank one sachet,its stinks,its stale product,i have to keep in referigator and have it because i have purchased by paying $-12.i never recommed this product to anyone.
I'm thirteen years old and I love these. The texture is a little awkward for me but I'm not going to mark it down for that, considering it's meant for little ones. Omnomnom.

I was buying these so I wouldn't have to stop at the store every day before work. Buying these from amazon with the Prime perk allowed me to get these for about $0.67 a can. They shipped quickly and arrived in two days. All this left me a happy camper.

They were however a little banged up on arrival but all the cans are intact and none sustained anything more than a couple dents here and there.

Will buy again.
Product was exactly as we expected and came exactly when they said it would.  The kids in my class love the candy!!!

These jerky packs are great.  They actually do fill you up or at least stop the grum bellies.  I stay away from all the products that are just different ways of eating sugar and corn syrup.  I have a boy with ADD and I don't have him on drugs so it is very nice to have a great tasting and filling snack that isn't just sugar with flavoring.  Since sugar and corn syrup are major contributors to that condition.  Keep up the good work Jack Link.

If you start reading cat food labels you will discover few that have the quality of ingredients that this one does. Well, actually you will discover some - probably in a nice pet food store - but good luck getting your cat to eat it!

One of my cats used to be pre-diabetic, asthmatic, and overweight. At that time his diet was exclusively Iams. My vet, who has done much research on various foods, has a list of cat food she recommends. Of all the expensive and exclusive brands of food, the Fancy Feast Turkey & Giblets Feast and the Gourmet Chicken Feast really made a difference, and my other more finicky eaters loved it! The 'problem cat' is no longer asthmatic, has lost weight, and is not pre-diabetic. Plus, everyone who sees him can't get over what a fantastic shiny coat he has. Now I buy these two flavors exclusively. I highly recommend this product.

We love Happy Baby products - cereals, puffs, yogurt melts, all the baby food - EXCEPT Gobble Gobble. Even my 3 year old choked on this. It really ticked me off when my 1 year old choked too! It is EXTREMELY dry and thick and lumpy. I cannot believe Happy Baby manufacturers and sells this stuff, and I can't believe retailers stock it. DO NOT BUY!

I found this coffee to be great at first, but as I started having it more and more I came to detest it. On the large setting the coffee is WAY too watery. Also, the flavor is very, very overpowering and kind of tastes like bananas.

It is a pretty good mid-afternoon or evening desert coffee, but other than that it is kinda gross.

Tge first bag I had was good and a nice change from chips but as I had these every day for lunch for a month I quickly tired of them. The jalepeno one is the best. They all leave a residue on your fingers.

I tried & tried & tried to breast feed & after hiring a lactation nurse, taking drugs from here & Canada ... Pumping every 2-3 hours with what looked like a car battery. I finally read in my studies & research that women with bad thyroids sometimes can not breast feed. So there you have it. Then I turned my research to formula & this one is by far the superior formula. My baby bear lives it. He actually likes it room temp.

I have to give my cat 3 pills a day. Pill pockets are the greatest! I have to use the Salmon flavor though. The chicken just didn't go over very well & once she tried the salmon she wouldn't eat the chicken. I use pill pockets for my dogs too. It so much easier than trying to shove a pill down their throats. It's also a lot less messier than some of the food products I've tried hiding the pills in.

I work super early in the morning and frequently had not been eating a good breakfast.  When I found these, I discovered they were awesome to grab right before I left for work so that I could eat a little later in the morning.  I know I am being a lot more healthy now by not skipping the most important meal of the day :).

These cookies didn't disappoint.  They are delicious and go really well with a cup of tea or coffee.  They have just the right amount of sweetness...not cloying.  (I think American desserts usually go overboard on sugar).  I highly recommend them.

These cookies have a great flavor and no aftertaste that I can detect. I do not find them gritty at all. They are quite crispy, but I like that. I think they are as good as any regular sugar cookie I have ever had, and my non-GF friends agree!

I do not like my coffee bitter but I also don't like it to be tasteless either. I have tried so many different brands of coffee for my Keurig and this is my favorite. It's not bitter and has a nice smooth coffee flavor. Just an all around good cup of coffee.

These are too hard and brittle (almost hurt my teeth trying to bite into them). We got them for our office and everyone had the same opinion. We have a stack of these boxes lying around now since nobody wants to eat them.

Plugra Clarified Unsalted Butter has been on my radar for the past year or so. Finally its back in supply in the 5# bucket. Ordered and received within days and already in use. I baked a loaf of bread using this product and it was remarkable. Other clarified butters that I've used in the interim have all had a good taste but simply did not stand up to Plugra. Easy to use and it doesn't require refrigeration. However, be cautioned - with this amount, unless you use it regularly, you should refrigerate. One way around this is to keep about a pound or so on the counter. That way its always softened and at the ready, then scoop out an amount as necessary. Taste is rich, buttery and remains in a softened state on the counter. It works really well with making bread dough as it provides the proper consistency when kneading.

Upon arrival there was a problem - however Parthenon Foods contacted me first thing Monday morning and explained that they included a small gel pack to be on the safe side for long distances such as mine. Their rep was very courteous, non condescending and a real pleasure to work with. I will not hesitate to reorder.
I love cooking with major grey chutney and a hint of ginger, but this brand has way too much ginger. The ginger makes it very bitter and overpowering.

Like others, I ordered this product after Petsmart stopped carrying it. I ordered 3 packages a month or so ago and the treats were fine, my dog LOVED them like always! When I went to re-order, I read the review about the treats now being "basted" with duck flavor instead of being wrapped with dried duck pieces and thought it was weird, because my order was the same. That is, until I received this last order of 4 packs this week. All of them were basted or really more like stained in duck flavor -- my dog, who was usually so excited to get one of these treats, left it on the floor untouched. We are both VERY disappointed -- not at Amazon, but at the manufacturer for changing their product
I like this tea, it tells you on the package on how to prepare it. Not a lot of flavor but hey Dr Oz recommended Oolong tea so hear I am ;) It is suppose to help your metabolism, to early to tell.

My 10 year old saint bernard is moving around like he did when he was a puppy!  I see a very notable difference in him since he started eating the Breeders choice active care foods!  I couldn't be more pleased!
These crackers are wonderful with British Cranberry Cheese. Get them while they are in stock during the fall and order enough to last. Chocolate and Art Lover
I loved this gummy. I had bout the green one ..Very tasty and delicious! I would buy it again. Thanks!

I really like the taste of these little cookies, and this is the best flavor (IMO).  I got these when they were marked down to $12 and felt like I was paying an OK price.  They have gone back up in price, so waiting for it to come back down so that I can buy more.

If you want great vanilla, hazelnut flavor DO NOT BUY THIS TEA. It taste good, but has such an overpowering cinamon and spicy taste that the vanilla and hazelnut is lost. It also is not good for people with acid reflux. I take prilosec everyday and usually can eat almost anything without suffering, but 3 tums later and I still hurt.

Like I said it does taste good and I will buy yogi products in the future, but I will read the ingredients first.

This is very bland, but useful as a base to cook with.  Other than the fact that it's gluten free, it isn't anything special.  Since the gluten free choices are limited, I will use it, but, otherwise, would pass.

oat flour is a good source of protein and fiber. It worked fine in my homemade bread along with white and wheat flours. it is nicely flavored and light textured. I didn't like it as much in crepes where it was the only flour used. it worked great in place of white flour for high altitude brownie mix instructions. I like Bob's Red Mill high quality products.
We are on Amazon Prime, so order arrived quickly. Amazon Prime is delightful! I highly recommend that too.
"Turkish Delight"  to is true it's name - delightful. This specialty candy reminds me of my childhood. If you like turkish delight this is the best !

I like Kettle chips but was really disappointed with this order because they were over cooked. I bought a bigger sized bag from Costco and the chips were all cooked perfectly. So I don't know why these were different.
Will never buy these chips from here again.
I really enjoy this coffee - I have used a variety of the K-cups and this is one of the best.
A co-worker shared these with me the other day and I'm on here buying them now, because I need more! They taste just like Combos to me, but they are better for you!

Jack Link's Beef Steak, Flavor, 1-Ounce Packages

These are a nice snack, maybe a 6 on a 10 point scale, I prefer the Buffalo Bills 2.1lbs Hot Short Shots (120 beef sticks per bag)

Gunner March, 2010

These are better than any low calorie chips I've ever had, and I prefer them to normal chips. They are wonderful. Oprah even loves them.  I would buy this box again, and probably will, because I LOVE that these are 100 calorie packs. The barbeque and salt and vinegar ones are AWESOME.

Two bowls of this cereal for breakfast, and I have apparently achieved 100% of my recommended daily dietary consumption of fiber. Since I found myself spending five dollars and change for a box of this stuff at least twice a week at any supermarket in NYC, here I am on Amazon ready to order a subscription for 6 boxes for $20 with shipping. Now if they only had a variety pack...

Childhood nostagia all over again! I LOVE peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, but I don't often make them because they're rather messy. These bars solve that problem-- the oats and stuff provide a perfect compliment to the peanut butter and jelly flavor that's in the bar. The best part is that I can eat this on the go and not have to worry about my hands or clothes getting messed up.

The creamer itself is fine, the packaging is crap. Several of them broke open and leaked everywhere creating a huge mess (that or someone at the warehouse has a sick sense of humor). As an added bonus, this item isn't eligible for returns. Amazon refunded me the purchase price though, so kudos to their customer service.
These are great for on the go! I keep a couple in the diaper bag in case we get in a bind and need a quick snack!

Incorrect item sent to gift recipient which necessitated repackaging the item and traveling to a post office.
Poor customer service.

I love this product and order it frequently.  Usually it arrives in a timely manner and in good condition.  When I opened this last shipment I found some hemp seed scattered throughout the box.  I carefully removed the first of two pouches and found a 1" rip in the middle of the front of the bag.  Most of the product was still in the pouch and appeared fresh and undamaged so I transferred it to a container.  The other pouch was intact.  I hope this is a one-time occurrence, and I will be ordering this again when I need more.  More care needs to be taken to assure that the pouches are handled properly and that they are all in good condition when packed.

I absolutely love these hemp seeds. They come vacuum-sealed and I just transfer them to a large freezer bag when I open them, and store them in the freezer.

Hemp seeds are a perfect protein, supplying your body with all the essential amino acids. In just 3 tablespoons of these seeds, you're getting 11 grams of protein! They are also super high in other minerals and vitamins, as well as omega-3 fatty acids.

We sprinkle these on just about anything - oatmeal, yogurt, pizza, you name it. I mix them in with all types of food for my now 15 month old son. They are SO good for babies and young children with all the omega-3 fatty acids, protein, minerals.

I subscribe to this item and only pay $50 with free shipping - can't beat the price for such a healthy item.

this is my favorite coffee. Full of flavor and not acidic at all, without that "burnt" taste I often taste in coffees. I wanted to try something new and went for another highly reviewed brand, which is not bad at all, but I am going back to Seattle's Best when I run out.
my cats love this thing and use it a ton! however, the toy in the hole is just a crunchy ball thing not a mouse.

This cereal tastes great! It's light, crunchy and mildly sweet. You don't get any weird after tastes that other gluten free products tend to have. It tastes like real cereal and not a fake gluten free version of cereal... if you know what I mean. It stays crunchy in all milk varieties (dairy and non-dairy). I just love it!!! I even pack in little containers and take to work to eat dry as a snack. The cereal comes in environmental friendly bags. You get 6 bags per shipment. I pour a bag into a large air tight pasta jar for easy dispensing and I put the empty bangs in the recycle bin. You really can't beat the convenience and price of Amazon's Subscribe and Save. I highly recommend this product.
I recieved 4 bags of flops but was suppose to get a free additional bag . I put in the special code .Not sure I am going to order through amazon again for candy.

I am not a big fan of most protein bars but have found several Kashi varieties that are very good.  Way too expensive on Amazon though.  Target sells these loose for a buck and a quarter.  I usually pick up a few of these and the Oatmeal Raisin rolls whenever I stop there.

(See the image gallery for my three photos that accompany this review)

I hadn't eaten a Chips Ahoy in a while, but was kind of looking forward to these new "Gooey" chocolate chip cookies. But, from the moment I opened the package I knew I was going to be disappointed! First off, the cookies were a crumbled and jumbled heap of a few cookies in overly large packaging... the same as regular Chips Ahoy packaging that would hold two or three times as many cookies. Not the most appetizing first impression. So... is this really what Nabisco wants us to see when we open the package?? a jumble of cookies in an overly large package for the few cookies you get? A total turnoff from the beginning. I didn't expect the cookie to be as big as the photo on the package, but I did expect it to at least kind of look like the photo (which looks like a standard Chips Ahoy with the goo inside). This cookie was dark and mottled and misshapen and kind a gross to look at.

Okay, presentation stinks, but maybe the cookies are really good nonetheless? Um... no... they kind of suck. And, Gooey?? Not even close... it is a wedge of grainy and dry chocolate-like stuff in the middle. The most distinct flavor (or really after-taste)? That is an overly sugary and heavily preserved food-like substance. After one cookie, I tossed the rest out.

Bottom line... just plain gross.
My famiy loves these granola bars.  They do not have a bland taste, rather, they are sweet and taste of peanut butter.
Once you add this syrup to the shaved ice, its like when you have a good snow cone and there is only a drop of flavor in the end...this is how it is from the beginning.

I picked up a can of this soup because it sounded interesting, but I was very disappointed. The base was really bland, I was thinking it would be sweet because of the corn, but it wasn't. The chicken was okay but the carrots were mushy and the celery was cut too big and was bitter. I didn't even finish it and definitely won't be buying it again.

Triscuits are great, and these are not only tasty, but fairly healthy.  The only ingredients are wheat, a little oil and a little salt!  Excellent.  And buying them on amazon is so much cheaper than at the store!!  :-)
I've been trying different kinds of popcorn and this rates as one of the best out there. A must try for any popcorn lover.

I would caution anyone ordering this to realize that the chocolate melts in warm temperatures. Mine arrived in a chocolate coated bag. I put it in the fridge to try to solidify it a bit, but it wasn't a big improvement. Makes it hard to eat out of the bag. I really didn't want a chocolate flavored cereal, so I was planning on enjoying this as an eat out of the bag snack, but the melted chocolate makes it messy. The chunks are an okay size for that, but it would probably work better as a cereal since the chocolate melted.

When I purchase granola, I usually look for ones with either almonds or pecans. This has neither. The only solids listed in the ingredients are whole grain rolled oats and chocolate chunks (first 2 ingredients). The rest of the ingredients are predominately sweeteners. A serving is 1/2 cup and that has 220 calories, 50 of which are from fat. There are 4g of fiber, 13g of sugar, 20g of other carbohydrates, and 5g of protein. Just because something is "natural" doesn't mean it is good for you.

I bought this food hoping to add a little variety to my cat's diet.  He's been on Felidae and Evo since I took him home.  I hoped this would be a good alternative high protein brand.  I won't be coming back.  When I opened the bag I was surprised to find that while there were some full pieces of food, most of the kibble had fallen apart into a fine dust. After a few weeks of eating this half powder/half round kibble bits diet my cat began to develop acne on his chin from having to rub his little chin in the dusty bits of food.  He hated the food so much he would go pry open the door of the closet where his other foods were kept and rummage through the other bags of food.  He also appeared to have some kind of an allergic reaction to the food which manifested in vigorous licking of his front paws until they were raw.  Poor guy. I understand every cat is different, but I was extremely disappointed by this crumby (pun intended) food.
Excellent product.  In my opinion, the best of the Senso coffee blends.  I will continue to purchase this product as long as it's available.

It's instant Oatmeal. Sweet and tasty for a quick out the door breakfast.
In the morning at work I just mix it with 1/2 cup water from the instahot tap in a disposable coffee cup and I'm good to go.

If you're looking for a healthy and "heart smart" cereal, this could be it. As a cold cereal, the flakes are tasty and crunchy. The blueberry/kash clusters are also nice, adding texture and flavor, although I find that they float to the bottom of my bowl midway through. I usually eat this with just milk for breakfast or to fuel a midday jog, but I've also been known to eat it right out of the box when I'm hungry and need something healthy to eat ASAP!

The taste is slightly sweet without going overboard and could use a few more blueberries per serving, but I add my own. This cereal is not, unfortunately, organic, as other items in the Kashi line are. But it's still a great selection for a quick meal any time of the day!

As for best prices on this product, I do NOT support Wal-Mart regardless of how low their prices are. Whole Foods tends to be the most expensive, of course, and I've seen this elsewhere for about $3.49 per box. Because it's Kashi, it won't be cheap but it's a good addition to your diet if you can afford it.
Awesome taste, perfect crunch; these are the best seeds I've ever had. Not to mention I love how it isn't nearly as salty as the other seeds.

Honestly, that's what I thought throughout trying this tea. The smell and taste is entirely of cinnamon. I couldn't ever taste the tea- and even in my smallest cup it tasted weak and watery.

If you want caffeinated cinnamon, go for it.

If you want true chai... look elsewhere.

PS. What's with the size of the bags? Not even 2 grams per bag. Even for American-style tea bags, this is small.

I love buying gummies wholesale because they are so much cheaper per pound than buying them at the candy store! I am always able to find any gummy I need from them, with good prices, and quick shipping!

I have been eating Erin's for Breakfast for over 2 yrs now. Very filling, taste is excellent. Good to take along when you're late for work as I usually am. A great all around breakfast. I like mine warmed up in the Microwave.
This is a box of 4 gallon jugs of Arizona Sweet Tea. It is sometimes hard to find in a store - enough said.
This is the best marinade I have ever had.  Marinated a brisket overnight, slow cooked it for 10hrs, and it broke apart.  Best brisket I have ever had.  Would definitely recommend it.
This is a wonderful large salt crystal that really adds color and flavor to any dish you would accent with salt. It does disolve quickly so use it just before serving.

I am not a die hard candy person, but these are great! They do cost a bit more; but they're not that much more. And besides, you ARE putting it in your body, so I think you're worth it.

They are made from real fruit extracts; ironic that that is so rare. The taste has loads of flavor. They taste like real fruit. Nice and tart, not like that sicky sweet that I can't identify in the artificial flavored pops. Blueberry and cherry are my favorite, but all are excellent. While not health food, they are a healthier version of junk food.

Enjoy!

It took a while to get here, but it got here nonetheless.  This dish is actually quite spicy (and I love hot food).  It was too hot for my wife.  However, it was very tasty, and I will definitely buy it again!
This tea is so delicious and the package of 10 is perfect for a little gift for someone.

I was surprised to discover that I can brew 16 oz. of flavorful tea, very comparable to the Yorkshire Gold I normally brew from leaves!
I have even brewed a 20 oz pot when I wanted a milder tea in the evening.
It does not have the richness of Bewleys Clipper Gold or Twinings Irish Breakfast, but it's close.
The only drawback is cost, but that is compensated by convenience.

I was hoping these would be a bit more exciting than they were. My son eats everything, but was fairly disinterested in these. I don't really blame him, I tried them myself and was underwhelmed with the flavor. Couldn't detect mango at all in the mango risotto! Organic ingredients are a huge plus though, so I'm glad they exist.

This has been my favorite for quite a while. I usually bought 2 bottles at a time, and now I can't find it anywhere.
DITD (Down in the dumps!)

Update - Jan 8, 2009
PLEASE BE CAREFUL - I ordered this item and they sent me the fat-free variety. If I had wanted the fat-free variety I would have ordered it.
Amazon made it right though. They sent me the correct item.

This tea is wonderful. Delightful taste of mango, you can make it stronger by adding more tea bags if strong is your preference. Add a little honey and its delicious. Had neighbors try it and they fell in love, drank my whole stash. One of my spouse's favorites, even I enjoy it and I'm a coffee drinker!
This cake mix has sodium lauryl sulphate in it, one of the main ingredients that make soaps and detergents lather. Gross!
Once I began to eat these, it was hard to stop!  I ate them straight from the bag!  They're perfectly crunchy and tasty!  Now I need to buy more so I can try them with milk...yum!

My dog absolutely loves these dental chews, but I love that they're good for him and clean his teeth. I started with a sample from the vet, and ever since he's been hooked. He's only 14 weeks old, but I figure why wait on oral hygiene. As he gets permanent teeth and grows a bit more, I think I'll switch to the next size up. I like to use them as an after dinner treat, and they keep him occupied for a good while (adult dogs may get through them a little quicker). Obviously, not all dogs are going to like the same thing but Blu goes bananas for these if I just touch the bag! These are much cheaper than at the vet's office and I think a great deal when you compare to similar-types of products at big box stores, that may or may not work. I plan on keeping a steady suppy of these around the house!

As the previous reviewer stated, the cans do arrive dented up.

However the shipping was timely and free, and the beans are the proper tasting Heinz Beans that I miss so much from Britain.

They are wonderful with just buttered toast, or with the toast and a fried egg or two for breakfast. Yum!

Especially good in the morning with cream and a touch of sugar.  The flavor lingers on the palate very pleasantly. I have a long drive to work and take a cup of this with me to liven up the drive. So, there I am with my audio-book and coffee actually making the best of my drive.  You really need to try this coffee.
good tea quick service for shipment, great price for the tea, will order more when needed.  nothing else to say

these biscuits are really tasty. low in sugar, low in salt, no wheat, no milk products with no sacrifice in flavor. i have tried the ginger and the dried fruit flavors both are really truly amazing. this is a favorite of mine.

not quite all the products shown on the photo, but the recipients were very happy. no brand names as pictured.

bummer: even though the card i wrote was showing that it fitted, when they received the actual paper card, the message was truncated.

The only way to improve upon these cookies is by making and/or processing them with USDA Organic ingredients...and maybe adding nuts. Other than that, the flavor is not overly rich or sweet and the texture is just right.

I'm a big fan of both green and mint teas, so moroccan mint (a blend of mint and green) is a natural favorite of mine.

I've tried moroccan mint from other places, and have not been impressed. The moroccan mint from teavana was just plain gross. This though, I can say is the best tea I've ever had.

A great price too. Something like a dollar per ounce. Tea stores usually charge $8 for every 2 ounces.

I steeped a spoonful with about 12oz in an IngenuiTEA. Very pleased. ;)
This is the very best coffee ever!! Being from New Orleans and living far away, it is next to impossible to get that "real taste of home." I'm so excited to have a source for "real" coffee!!

These are the best pretzels on the market today. We have been acquiring them for quite some time. They are crunchy, just the right about of salt and package size. However the most important attribute is their profits are provided to a charitable causes.

That's the first thing I noticed when I received these Madagascar Vanilla Beans in the mail. I baked these Vanilla Beans in a Fluffy White Cake and boy was it good! There moist too! I can't wait to put these babies in Ice Cream! I will definitely be ordering some more soon! ^_~

Got both the chicken and peanut butter ones. Our three month old Shi Tzu loves them. He favors the chicken over the peanut butter slightly, but won't turn either away. These are pea sized making it possible to give one after another as a training reward. A winner overall.

I am a bariatric patient, and these are wonderful on the go snacks for me. In moderation, if course. But they taste amazing, I haven't met one person yet that doesn't like them. And the prices on Amazon are excellent, you won't find them cheaper anywhere else!

I bought this as a training treat for my little puppy and his siblings (whom I'm fostering) and they all love it! So for the amount of treats that you get in the bag and for the price, it's a great buy!

Gourmet Blend, Whole Grain Brown Rice.  Yummy!  A tummy pleaser.  My husband LOVES this rice - a little more than I do. I've made three cups at a time rather than the two-cup recipe so that my husband will have some left over for an evening treat or next day treat.  I use Tones Chicken or Beef Base along with some Orzo and Spice Classics vegetable flakes, thereby making my own Rice-A-Roni.  My cupboard is full of rice.  I also bought the 6-pack of Lundberg Wild Rice and Brown Rice Blend.  I'm not worried about expiration dates as long as the rice stays dry.  I think we will use up both boxes this year.  Good stuff.

This product isn't that bad. So far its the only dish from this series from Hormel that I have tried and its pretty good. For my taste it is a little sweet and like another reviewer remarked there is more sauce then needed so adding more rice is not a bad idea. Maybe adding some mixed vegies would be good too. As I tried this for office use that wasn't an option for me. Still, this is not a bad product and the flavor was good and since it does not need refrigeration this is a great product for office, on the road or any other situation where a refrigerator is not an option. I can grab this product, throw it in my backpack and go on with my day.

Portion size? Well for me its not bad. Sure, I have days where I could certainly use more but that's why packing an apple, crackers or other snack/side item is a good idea.

[My office does have a refrigerator but I work in an office where things sometimes disappear but most of the time its full of who knows what.]

This sugar has replaced my "white" sugar. It is sticky and clogs, so I transfered a small quantity in a small container to be used and leave the big bag closed.
Flavor is full and rich and fair trade was a plus for my choice.

My golden retriever, Whisper, is very prone to anxiety when I leave the house. I just fill this cube with Cheerios, or even her regular serving of her dog food, and she goes to town rolling it on the floor to get every bit of treats from the cube. We both love it!
Word of caution: You need to have the cube in a room where there are no places for the cube to roll into and get stuck, like under couches or chairs. I have blocked off high bottomed chairs and couches so the cube does not get rolled into and stuck. My dog rolls this all around the room. I should spray her with Endust and have her clean up her hair while she is playing. KIDDING!
Nice change from the regular pods. The coffee smells and taste yummy. A nice treat after dinner.
This coffee has a great flavor!  I am not sure if I would say creme brulee but it is very good.  Its not overpowering or weak.  Its perfect!

If you haven't had a Wickles you have got to try them.  My whole family goes crazy over Wickles, I ordered them through Amazon at a higher price than what I can get them for in Iuka, MS. but since I'm in Houston, TX and can't find them anywhere, I don't mind paying an extra .75 cents for a jar of Wickles.  Plus I'm a Prime Member so shipping is FREE!!  Love me some Wickles and love my Amazon!!

I already wrote a review for the chocolate chip ones, though I thought I was writing it for this flavor, so I will just copy and paste. THe both taste good.

I bought these bars as a meal replacement, since I am usually hungry about 4 hours after I had lunch, or 2-3 hours after breakfast, so I have to survive before the next meal. This does the job well. I can stay without eating for another 2-3 hours. It also depends how much water you drink, sometimes all you need is water to get rid of the "hunger". It's the way your body tells you you need water as well.

My stomach is somewhat sensible and doesn't like a lot of stuff, but these bars never bother me.

I also think they are tasty, but only the chocolate ones. I tried the strawberry ones, but they are too creamy. I also liked the chocolate chip ones, they both taste similar, though the chocolate chip ones have more fiber than these ones :P

I've tried several different coconut waters and the ZICO tastes the best to me. Use this in my smoothies daily. I was getting this product in the smaller tetra pak, but after opening the package you couldn't shake it up without spilling it. This works much better and I've taken as long as a week to use the 33.8 size with no degradation in taste.

This hot cocoa is delicious, low in calories, and reasonably priced. Although the label only states that it is fat-free, it is also sugar-free. It tastes as good as any hot cocoa that contains fat and sugar, yet contains far fewer calories. Try it!

Similar to my experience with Amy's chili, I find this soup--though quite nice on its own--is really a treat with personalized tweaks. In my case, I add a bunch of chopped, fresh mushrooms, a bit more pepper, some garlic and onion powders, and some thyme (fresh if I have it, dried if not). That makes it special for me.

I enjoyed this so much, I used the subscribe and save to get a case delivered. This is a comforting, flavorful soup that really is so much better than other brands of Cream of Mushroom I've tried, including Campbell's.

While I have not used it yet in casseroles (though I plan to, as I found a nice recipe for chicken, egg noodle, pea and cream of mushroom casserole), I love having this handy for those afternoons when I just want some soup and a half-sandwich for lunch at home or a simple late meal when my tummy needs comforting.

This and Amy's cream of tomato are among my top comfort soups on a can. Mmmm.

Mir

House Foods Ukon Energy Drink, 3.4-Ounce Bottles (Pack of 6)

So taste-wise, its not amazing (I have weird tastes, though: I LOVE the taste of 5 Hour Energy), and you can definitely taste the turmeric in it. BUT, it's real use is not as an energy drink but as a hangover preventer. Take a bottle before you start drinking and your hangover will be much lessened. I've got a friend who swears by it, and it worked OK for me... but I suspect the only reason it didn't work better was because we split a bottle between like 4 people, and I drank a TON. I feel like even that small amount helped, though!

Warheads and Toxic waste candies are super sour! These candies are great, tastes good, gives you a good kick, and creates competition among friends and family.

But caution:
It's citric acid. Any type of acid burns, the sour you taste is not really a taste... as crazy as it seems, it's really a feeling in your tongue. Yes it's a good amount of citric acid in one piece, but you're not supposed to eat multiple pieces in a short period of time. You will actually burn a layer of skin-like-material on your tongue. Too much consumption can cause the tongue to bleed. It will heal quickly, as long as you don't eat more in the process of healing.It is true your tongue will actually shed flakes like sun burn. I know it's disgusting but it's how the body heals naturally. Hope this information helped you, or any else it may concern. (Mostly your tongues)

My picky eater likes Supreme Supper. And she turns her nose up at most, be they pricey or cheap.
Amazon has good price with prompt problem free delivery.
Of note : it has more unattractive smell to me than most cat food. But happily ,I do not have to eat it. Cat gives a 2 paws up.

I used this truffle on mashed potatoes this holiday season. Many guests asked me why the potatoes tasted so well and different. I showed them the bottle and told them they could get the truffle oil on amazon.

This product was shown in the "Dashi no MSG" category however, the ingredients on the package show MSG is the second highest ingredient - the listing needs to be corrected, some folks are highly allergic to MSG, hence the danger. I ordered it and will return it.

So I mixed up this Mocktails Margarita, not having a clear idea of what to expect.  Once upon a time I found a faux Pina Colada mix that was delicious and sugar free and could never find it again.  This kind of disappointed me; I thought it tasted familiar, and realized that it tasted very much like lime Kool-Aid.  If you love lime Kool-Aid, that may not be a bad thing, but I was at least expecting something a bit more subtle.  At least is not kelly green.  More like an apple green.  I've taken a photo, and I'll try to post it on here.  My husband said he liked it, but I'm thinking my kids (20 and 15) don't care for it too much because I found a half-full glass of it sitting warm on the counter.  Usually, Tropical Punch flavored sugar-free Kool-Aid gets emptied in a day.  There is still a half gallon (I made up two packets) sitting in my fridge after three days.  Its okay.  Maybe it would be better with the essential Margarita additive???

These taste really good!

The primary nut is almond, although there is a background of peanuts, and occasionally cashew. The sweet element is made up of dried cranberries and a generous amount of dried cherries, held together by an undertone of honey and lashings of delicious dark chocolate to bind everything together. Delicious.

A haiku adds class and authority to any review,or, to put it differently, what can seventeen syllables tell us about this product?

Berries and cherries
Almonds peanuts cashews too
Choco honey yum.

i was expecting a, packaged,  Tea Sampler package from "k-Cup".. not a bunch of single,random k-cups throw into an amazon box. some of the k-cups were damaged and already had holes in them. this is not what i was expecting at all.
I agonized over what to put in my five year old's lunch.  I know she will actually eat these and they have a good amount of fiber (and even protein)!
Everyone loved the treats in this basket!! It was the perfect balance of cheese, meats, and crackers with sweets. I would recommend to anyone.
This is NOT Disco Dust which is edible and made for baking. DO NOT purchase this product for such purposes!

While I'll acknowledge that shipping catfood can be a pricey proposition, with three cats, and an upper-floor apartment, the convenience of home delivery makes it a desirable option...and Amazon's excellent reputation for on-time deliveries makes it a far more reliable choice than the other 'autoship' providers I've used.

Whiskas Purrfectly Fish Tuna Entree has been a favorite of my babies for over two years (surprisingly, it's the only 'seafood' item they like), and when you find something they love, you stick with it! While all the grocery chains in my area only offer it in a multi-flavor box (forcing me to pay for food the cats WON'T touch), through Amazon (and other carriers), the Tuna Entree pouches can be ordered individually for shipment, which is another reason I accept the increased price, without complaint.

So consider what your options are, and if the 'pros' outweigh the 'cons', I recommend Amazon as your choice!

This is a confection that has been around a few centuries.  It is a light, pillowy citrus gelatin with nuts - in this case Filberts. And it is cut into tiny squares and then liberally coated with powdered sugar.  And it is a tiny mouthful of heaven.  Not too chewy, and very flavorful.  I highly recommend this yummy treat.  If you are familiar with the story of C.S. Lewis' "The Lion, The Witch, and The Wardrobe" - this is the treat that seduces Edmund into selling out his Brother and Sisters to the Witch.

What can be said about a food product?

The color of the cherries are uniform and a nice color. The taste is not too sweet and not too tart. It is really the perfect balance. I've used these by putting a handful in my morning oatmeal and also alone for a snack.

If any one you make home ice cream this would be a great addition to vanilla ice cream. Or even added to a pie.

The only thing I would change about this product is the internal packaging. It would be nice if the bags was resealable.Traverse Bay Fruit Co. Dried Cherries, 4-Pound Box

Like others have said, the consistency of this stage 2 combo is very thin, but it could be thickened with oatmeal or cereal. My 7 mth old loved the flavor and impatiently waited for more, which she doesn't do with all baby foods. I like that it contains spinach for iron and fruit for antioxidants and to sweeten it a bit. I wouldn't use these everyday while I'm home because they are somewhat costly per pouch, but they are a terrific option for travel or when you need something easy on hand to feed baby. I tried squeezing the contents of the pouch into her mouth, which she didn't particularly like, but I think that's just because she's used to being fed with a spoon. An older baby could squeeze and eat this themselves and if you find yourself without a spoon, it's a great option.

The root arrived fresh and in good condition (95%).  The roots were active when shredded and used in a natural fermentation process by soaking at room temperature 70 - 80 F. covered by cheesecloth for three days.  I used them with ginger,and the resultant soda-like drink was delicious, flavorful, and intensely yellow-orange.  One pound made four gallons plus, and lasted when put in with paper towel in a plastic ziploc for about a month refrigerated.  Would use again.

I have been easily able to substitute Himalayan Salt with regular table salt for cooking, baking and flavoring my food at the table. I was on a special diet for esophagitis and starting using Himalayan Salt for its healing benefits. And because I was avoiding spicy food, it was the one "condiment" I could enjoy.

I have to disagree with another reviewer; I did not find this PB gritty at all.  I always but natural PB without any added sugar and also did not find this too sweet.  It has a nice, not overpowering, taste of maple.  Great snack on rice cakes!

This salt is wonderful as a finishing touch to prepared food. In addition to the pleasant flavor, it adds a very satisfying crunchiness to dishes. The grains do not dissolve readily, even in soups, and that's a benefit, as it adds texture and interest.

I find the price to be reasonable in comparison to competitor products. Though $5 a pound is a lot for salt, I expect this 5 pound bag to last a very, very long time.

This is a six-pack of fairly tall cans of salted peanuts.  I find the level of salt on these perfect - not too much, but not too little either.  Planters also does a good job of keeping out the sins and shells.  Arrives in a shrink wrap six-pack and each can is vacum sealed.

I have ordered this tea many times and have been happy every time. Arrives well boxed, in excellent condition and always as stated delivery. Less cost online than when it was available in my area; less cost than the actual product website. Each box is individually wrapped for freshness, then each bag is sealed in its own paper wrap. Never been disappointed in any order made for this tea and always happy with product received.

First off, Tangy Orange tastes like sh imho. Tropical Fruit hands down. Lived off this stuff for a little over a year now. Tropical Fruit got me through crazy work. Canvassed door-to-door seven to eight hours a day rain or shine, excessantly drank almost every day for a while, worked out and exercised like a monster or beast, and most recently been working as a server for nonstop four to six hour shifts continually active.

This is my recover-all cure-all push-on-all. Co-workers always ask me what the hell I'm drinking, sarcastically joke I'm drinking/taking drugs, but most directly, always tell me to slow down. Without this stuff, I wouldn't be able to be the me I really am, high-energy, high-energy spending, high energy to be calm, and high energy to be active. Friend used to tell me about this stuff way back at least 10 years ago, and now I know what he means. If you have any questions leave me a comment below. -Alvin

Both this product and Pro-Pest Clothes Moth Ready-To-Use Traps appear to be somewhat effective. Two traps, one of each brand, were placed in two different closets (a total of four traps) over a three-month period with an insignificant difference between the two brands in the number of moths caught, eight for Pro-Pest and seven for Safer. Given the small number of individuals trapped, I've extended the experiment for another three months with four new traps, but at this point, Safer appears to be the better buy, costing roughly half of Pro-Pest at the time of this writing.

The low morals of female clothes moths (they are polyandrous!) and the fact that the attractant is the female pheromone means the traps will mostly collect adult males. So, a few clever randy males can keep the population going. Although neither product is apt to eliminate all the clothes moths in your closets, they do seem to reduce the overall number. If you have a sufficiently large freezer, placing your woolens in them for a week, combined with the traps, can be quite helpful.

UPDATE: After another three months, using the same protocol and a total of eight traps, Safer appears to be the better choice, both by effectiveness and price. The total number of moths trapped by brand were:
Safer -- 16
Pro-Pest -- 10
My vet recommended this to me for my dog that seemed to have a sensitive digestive system.  It has worked great for her.  Nice product.  My dog really enjoys eating it also.

The Packaging: I really like the packaging. There are 6 small packs in 1 box; so its ready to take with you where ever. Each small pack has ~8 crackers in it. None were cracked in the one i received. I dont think it would be an issue anyways as they are nicely packed.

The Texture: Lives up to its name of 'Fresh Stacks'. They are dry but not so dry that your mouth becomes parched and it becomes a chore to chew and swallow. After a little chewing it melts quite nicely in your mouth. Each cracker; you can think of as a slightly bigger square credit card in terms of the size.

The Taste: It strikes a nice balance in terms sweetness. You definitely get a graham/cinnamon type taste; with the sweetness of honey. Works well with peanut butter as well as my personal favorite nutella.

In case your interested here are some nutritional facts(note that this is for 1 pack,i.e, 8 crackers):
Calories: 250
Fat: 6 g
Total Carbs: 46g
Sugars: 16g

The coffee is excellent the price great. After my K cup took a dive I gave the T-disc a try Wow. It was better than any of the K-cup brands I had. The only unfortunate draw back is you can't seem to get the T-disc in stores. Good thing Amazon has them at a good price.

I had read the reviews, but was not ready to order (6) boxes without trying it first. I found it available at Target for $2.13 box and I just love it! I have tried other mint teas and I thought they were too weak, I couldn't taste the mint, but this tea is just right! Do try for you are in for a treat!

This is a great product. I am French and bought it as it is a traditional Christmas sausage, just sauteed in butter with apples...wonderful. Tasted just like the ones in France and it was a big hit with all of our American friends. Highly recommend!

This is one of the few ways that I can sneak vegetables into my picky toddler! He *loves* these pouches! If you give your child more than one pouch at a time, be sure to give her the less sweet pouch first, or she may reject the second one.

I keep these in my diaper bag so that I always have a healthy snack on hand for my little guy!
the scottie dogs are very good licorice. i'm glad to have purchased them.they are hard to find.they where at a resonable price.i would buy them again.

This is a creamy textured soup with a little bite. It does contain chicken broth, for those who are vegans to be aware of.
It's a quick healthy snack, and I find I turn to it again and again.
I buy it on Amazon as its no longer available at the stores I shop in. Its been a favorite for the past two years.
It has a wonderful, interesting flavor, has a reasonable caloric content (1 C= 140 cal.) and needs nothing to make it more so, like many other soups which lack interest.
I'm about to purchase my second case.
This is THE mmmost delicious Kind bar there is! Its like eating a candy bar, except its good for you.
I was expecting a more flavorful taste such as the hazelnut blend(which I liked very much) but this wasn't very tasty to me. Won't be ordering this again.

My pups LOVE this food! WELLNESS products have consistently proven to be top of the line food for dogs and cats and their Chicken Stew is no exception!
This is so well made and although the sauce is kinda slimy, it is a healthy slimy and one that nourishes my dearest of creatures! Please note that this food is not meant as a dish all unto itself, but rather, it is a food topper to go with dry food nuggets. Together the nutrition abounds!

Great tasting product from Smart Balance. I eat it regularly along with alomonds purchased from Amazon. This is a great source of essential fatty acids without the hydrogenated oil. Some minor stirring is required as is the case with all-natural nut butters. Fast shipping, even to an FPO/AP address. I will purchase more, I'm sure.

Unlike some of the other reviewers, my cookies arrived in tact!  In fact, out of the 4 containers less than 6 cookies were broken.  The cookies were delightful.  So good in fact that these will be the cookie of choice for Santa this year.  So go grab a glass of milk and indulge in these cookies.

I have used TRESemme products for quite a few years,but not these two items recently my friend received a sample in the mail and passed them on to me. I love both the shampoo and conditioner that sample was the source for this order. Thanks to my friend

My husband and I were looking for a good snack and these fit the bill for us. More fiber than your normal pretzel, lots of flavor and has a decent amount of protein too. These are terrific! Its been part of our diet for over a year and we have lost about 60 pounds each. We make our own hummus and eat these with it, or I eat them with a wedge of laughing cow cheese or peanut butter.
Super yummy! Really hits the spot when I want a chocolatey snack that won't break the calorie bank.
Loved the way it was packaged, only had to make sure we had bottles of water cold, not 2 sets of containers.

The first thing I noticed when I opened the package was a really strong minty, doggy smell. I still can't decide what it is beneath the mint, but it is potent! Whatever it is, my little Maltese had no problem with it. She quickly buried the first one in the backyard, which she only does with things she really likes. She'll recover it later, I'm sure. The next day I gave her another one which she worked on for several hours before it was gone. When she jumped in my lap later, I immediately noticed that her bad breath problem was gone...wow! And it seems to last for hours. For us this is a big plus since doggy halitosis is a big problem with her.

Another big pro for me is that these chews contain no wheat or corn products which cause allergy problems for my dog. Treats that she actually likes that don't contain these products are hard to find.

One other con besides the strong odor is the gassiness that occurs later. I might not have put two and two together on this had several other reviewers not mentioned it. This is not normally a problem with her, however, and since nothing else in her diet has changed, I would have to attribute it to the Zoe chews.

Since bad breath is such a problem with our dog, I might be tempted to purchase them regularly, even if the price works out to $2 per chew (5 in a bag @ $10 per bag). I might shop around first to see if I can find a better price, though. Maybe I could make them a weekly treat instead of a daily one.

I tried this decaf - in words it was OK, not really good. It tastes like a very mild blend, which is probably why I can't say much for it.

It froths up in the Senseo, just like any other pod, so it salvages a couple of stars, anyway.

I don't know... maybe I got a bad batch. The pastry was sandy in texture, broken in a million pieces by the time it got here. I reconstructed one to give it a try. The filling had a strange, bitter taste; the bad aftertaste was horrible. Such a shame, because I have enjoyed other Mr. Kipling products. Try Mr. Kipling's Cherry Bakewells (yum!) or Battenbergs. I wouldn't even give these a second try.

This marinara sauce is incredible. Every Friday, while my family is out of the house, I fill my bath tub with this, submerge myself in it, and pretend I'm a meatball. I blast classical music such as Bach and read Architecture magazines. I look forward to Fridays.
These Pop Chips are great! Love them, even low in WW points.Popchips, Original, 0.8-Ounce Single Serve Bags (Pack of 24)

After finding these at Target, I bought some for my dogs.  They absolutely love them!  At $6.79 per bag, though, they were really expensive.  I tried to find them cheaper and have succeeded.  Even though there is no 'free shipping', the price makes up for it if you buy a bunch of them.  I bought 10 bags and came out better than if I had bought them at Target.

I was really looking forward to having a way to toss a few pouches of brine-less olives in my purse for a non sugary snack on the go.

I am SOOO disappointed in the texture and flavor of these olives; mushy and gummy in the mouth and like gasoline on the tongue -- yuck. I was very happy with amazon customer service, they gave me a refund.

Maybe olives are stored in brine for a reason.
This brew is not bitter or too strong, it makes a good cup of coffee if you like a mild taste

I love me the regular Mi-Del Ginger Snaps... but out of a fluke I picked me up a gluten free bag once and thought it tasted not so yummy.  like ginger flavored sweetend hard dirt.  so unless you have to have the gluten free for some reason go get you the normal ginger snaps which as of Sep 2006, Amazon offers

I had been making my own homemade taco seasoning, but it is time consuming.  Being health-conscious, I didn't want to purchase any more products that contained ingredients I couldn't pronounce.  I am glad I found this taco seasoning as we cook taco/burrito meat generally about once each week, if not more.  Organic is best and the taste is wonderful.

Really enjoyed using this product. I love that it is vegan and gives a similar flavor to things as the non vegan versions. We made our Mexican fideo with it finally and we had really missed it, but no more. Good value and good flavor. Can't wait to try it in other stuff.

This was a good sample of different types of pods, although I am not sure I can tell them apart in a blind tasting.  There are definitely differences in the brands - I do like some better than others, but overall are all pretty good.
My finicky cat who needs a pill everyday eats these babies up. Medication delivery is soo simple now!

New puppy loves this, only treat he will pay attention to while walking and training. One note, pieces are quite large so I cut them up into smaller pieces so their recommended daily amount goes further.

All the dogs in the dog park can't resist my pocket when I have these treats. Usually surrounded by a crowd of dogs all poking at my pocket.
fantastic!you can not beat this taste and you can not resist to it only one if you are spice lover

My dogs loved these treats. Do they reduce tartar over time? I have no idea. You see, my dogs loved these so much that when I was at work, they somehow got the box off the table and ate them all! Stinkers! And they are VERY picky about treats.

The biscuits are a fairly good size, about 4 inches long and about 1 inch think, which is much thicker than standard biscuits. They are very hard and crunchy. It took several minutes for my dogs to eat the ones I gave them, and they are good size dogs and big chewers, weighing between 50-85 pounds each.

I'll be looking for this in my local market. If they don't sell them here locally, I'll get more from Amazon. Looks like I'll have to put them WAY up the top shelf in my kitchen though!

I found these in Salt & Pepper flavor in huge 20 oz. bags for $2.80 at BigLots recently. They are very tasty and they have no artificial aftertaste whatsoever. We were in the middle of one bag when we pulled out chips that seemed wet. Turns out it was just the oil on the chips.
They are mighty flavorful and crunchy, but, yes, they can be greasy. Definitely a guilty pleasure to be eaten in moderation!

I was trying to drink more green tea but found most to be rather tasteless. Then I tried the green chai tea and I love it. It has a richer taste with all the various spices it has blended with the green tea.
This is a great product because it doesn't spike your blood sugar. It tastes closer to sugar than anything else I've ever tried. It's expensive, but just use it sparingly.

Wanted to try this smoothie mix and am glad I did. It has great authentic banana taste and a fair amount of protein in a serving. I've had it plain-jane, added it to my regular vanilla whey protein powder with a few blueberries, and added some peanut butter powder to the banana powder and they are all good.

First off, i would have to say that I did not find the Bacon flavor to be appealing at all.

OK I'm kidding. I didn't actually lick it.

But my dog did, and she loves it.

The basics:
The container is like a roll-on antiperspirant. If you use roll-on deodorant, and buy this product, you may accidentally sport a new aroma if you are particularly groggy in the morning.
Its a no-calorie treat if your dog is ... uh... "easy to see" as they say. My dog is a bit thick (like a barrel on stilts), so I had some high hopes for this product.

The pros:
My dog loves it.
Its low calorie.
No crumbs!

The cons:
You can't throw it in the laundry room as an easy way to get them to be put up.
I had to hold it upside down, and it would drip.
When my dog is aggressive she threatens to take it away from me.

Overall, I would say that this is one of the few products that delivers exactly what it promises. I recommend it.
I love these and usually have one a day! They give me the POTATOE flavor and crunch without the fat and calories!

A very tasty Chai Latte...a nice treat and diversion from the other coffee options. Not too sweet and not too bland...just right with the flavor! The latte smells incredible when it's brewing...MMmmmm....Amazon had this product for an AMAZING price! So, you can't go wrong.

Sugar is getting older so I buy the Chicken Strips with Glucosamine. That's her reward a short trip outside in the morning :)

Supplier is great and pricing is fair - a little under the box store price. Since we buy it on Schedule and Ship, there is not shipping usually.
These are my favorite of the Be Kind bars. They're so tasty and keep me satisfied during the late afternoon hours when I'm feeling like a snack! Definitely good and good for you!
My dog loves these - and they smell delicious.  A healthy treat I don't feel guilty giving to him.

We received these beans within 10 days of ordering, we've never heard of them before but they are a very good tasting bean especially cooked and put on top of your lettace salad.  Will be buying them again.

I love my AeroGarden and was thrilled with the herbs and even happier with the cherry tomatoes.  When I discovered the green bean kit, I couldn't wait to try it.  My five-year old son loves green beans, and I was looking forward to having fresh beans to give to him.  When I planted the green beans, they grew rapidly just like the other kits.  However, the plants just grew and grew.  They became overly bushy and never produced any beans.  I waited and waited for the beans to grow and then finally tossed the plants out and replanted tomatoes.  This kit was very disappointing, and I am hesitant to try it again.

Having seen the TV adds for Blue Buffalo pet foods I was very optimistic to try this for my adult cat.  She is very finicky, preferring canned shredded meat to dry food though she will nibble on food like some major brand Cat Chow during the day.  So, I ordered a pouch of this and she just will not eat it.  If I offer it her in the morning and then fresh servings at lunch and dinner, she just will not eat it and sits by her bowl mewing and looking pathetic.  I was very disappointed.

Another reason not to buy this (from Newdsay):

"A Sea Cliff food company said Thursday it was recalling a snack called Veggie Booty because it had been alerted by the federal government of possible salmonella contamination."

Ouch! Eating this product will not only make you fat, but now it could kill you! Make your own popcorn instead.
I needed these for a project I'm working on and the misleading picture shows colorful acorn capsules. What I recieved was all blue ones! I'm upset!

I bought this because I'm grasping at straws. I was diagnosed with CLL (leukemia) in the latter half of 2010. Everyone that cares had all sorts of remedies to recommend. This was one of them. It, along with the other homeopathic remedies has done nothing to arrest the condition. My counts continue to rise (into abnormal range). Will it work for you? Some swear by this product as helpful. My suggestion: Buy three bottles. Take the recommended dosage "religiously" on a daily basis until you have completely depleted the supply. Have monthly blood tests. If you notice an improvement, bravo. If you don't, then you are only out about $20. Is your life worth that? I hope so.

Update October 20, 2011: I finished all the product I had purchased and reordered 3 more boxes. I still have not realized any improvement, in fact, my last blood test came back the highest (worst) it has ever been, by a considerable leap. Still it is the ONLY thing I am doing with any consistency and it gives my wife a sense that I am not giving up on myself. However, personally, my results cannot testify in favor of this product.
The greatest thing, honey you can sprinkle! Great on ice cream, buttered toast, anywhere you would use honey, with NONE of the mess!

This product is amazing. I initially bought the smallest canister to see how I would like it and I was immediately hooked! Not only does it give you gradual energy that is sustained throughout the day but it detoxifies your body. I remain very regular on it and see vast changes in my mood and energy level. I am unsure if it's helped my hair, skin and nails but they seem to be looking great so I would tend to think the juice is the cause. It doesn't taste the best but can be masked with any type of juice. My boss makes an entire meal out of it but in the mornings I don't have time to chop up and blend fruits so I just mix it in some juice, chug and I'm on my way.

This green powder is a must have!!

Have to say I was disappointed with this bread. Was suspicious when I saw how fine the mix was. It is usually more nutty. I grew up Ireland and watched my mother make it as a kid. The bread turned out not altogether bad but was a bit too "sawdusty" for my liking.

We LOVE Tinkyada pasta!  My son is allergic to wheat and egg and this was recommended to us as the best wheat free pasta.  They weren't kidding!  Both my son and I eat it and love it.  It's not mushy and has a great taste.  Even my 4 year old without any food allergies likes it!
Used this product for a summer party.  It was great!  It didn't clump, and was easy to keep heated.  Good tasting too.

Don't buy these from Amazon Warehouse like I did...total waste of money for these dry hunks of blandness.  I wouldn't know what they are like fresh, it wasn't sold to me that way...but at least my dog had dog chews.  Not sure why Amazon insists on selling worthless food rather than throw it away and risk ticking off customers and/or poisoning them.  I know they are closer to the expiration date buying it through the warehouse but seriously...THROW BAD FOOD AWAY AMAZON!  Sheesh.

I used quotes around the word tea because I doubt that the bags contain tea. I wouldn't be surprised if the bags contained ground up sticks instead of tea. I would not give this product a single star; it deserves zero stars in my opinion.
This tool is not allowing me to continue without giving the product at least one star.

I picked up two packs at my market based on Sunmaid and mixed fruit with peaches.
Of the two packs, one had a peach slice. Zero in the other. One was full of the
Plums. But are they plums or prunes? And overall, they are just stickey. My wife
loves dried fruit, so she got them in the work lunch first. She returned the bag and requested "no more of those". Accordingly, I threw out both packs. I called Sunmaid to comment 559 896 8000. And got a recording. Called back in the pm to ask if the consumer relations dept was working. The secretary said they are overwhelmed
with complaints and it may take one to two days to get call. This is the end of the second day without a call. Now, I don't care.
And, since i am thinking about Sunmaid, why did they make the raisen boxes smaller but keep the price the same...hmmmmm$$
MarshallGulch
